Class ResourceRestEndpoint

  • java.lang.Object

@Consumes("application/json")

extends Object

      • getAbstractResource

        @GET
@Path("{id}")
public AbstractResource getAbstractResource​(@PathParam("id")
                                            Long id)
        Get the resource or resource reference identified by the given id
        Parameters:
        id - the id of the resource or resource reference to fetch
        Returns:
        the resource or resource reference or null

      • getResourceChainForAbstractCardType

        @GET
@Path("fromCardType/{cardTypeOrRefId}")
public List<List<AbstractResource>> getResourceChainForAbstractCardType​(@PathParam("cardTypeOrRefId")
                                                                        Long cardTypeOrRefId)
        Get the resources linked to the card type or reference. With a list of resource references to retrieve each resource.
        Parameters:
        cardTypeOrRefId - the id of the abstract card type for which we look for the linked resources
        Returns:
        The targeted resource and a list of the references to get it

      • getResourceChainForCard

        @GET
@Path("fromCard/{cardId}")
public List<List<AbstractResource>> getResourceChainForCard​(@PathParam("cardId")
                                                            Long cardId)
        Get the resources linked to the card. With a list of resource references to retrieve each resource.
        Parameters:
        cardId - the id of the card for which we look for the linked resources
        Returns:
        The targeted resource and a list of the references to get it

      • getResourceChainForCardContent

        @GET
@Path("fromCardContent/{cardContentId}")
public List<List<AbstractResource>> getResourceChainForCardContent​(@PathParam("cardContentId")
                                                                   Long cardContentId)
        Get the resources linked to the card content. With a list of resource references to retrieve each resource.
        Parameters:
        cardContentId - the id of the card content for which we look for the linked resources
        Returns:
        The targeted resources and a list of the references to get them

      • renameCategoryForCardType

        @PUT
@Path("renameCategory/cardType/{projectId}/{cardTypeId}/{oldName}")
public void renameCategoryForCardType​(@PathParam("projectId")
                                      Long projectId,
                                      @PathParam("cardTypeId")
                                      Long cardTypeOrRefId,
                                      @PathParam("oldName")
                                      String oldName,
                                      String newName)
        Rename the category in a card type / card type reference
        Parameters:
        cardTypeOrRefId - the id of the card type / card type reference (scope of the renaming)
        projectId - the id of the project concerned (scope of the renaming)
        oldName - the old name of the category
        newName - the new name of the category
